relation: I love my school. You come to college to get a degree, but I am pursuing my degree and having fun.
My friends and I find anything to do for fun. Walk the stadium, explore our school, and just go to different campus activities offered everyday.
The food is great to me. The food isn't mom's home-cooked meal. The variety brings something new to me.
I LOVE the dorms. A variety of dorms are offered. I love my privacy and the study rooms our dorms have to offer.
My school really pushes to have great academic rigor because we don't want to fall below. Staying on top is what makes us better.

Do not play around your freshman year or it will come back on you. Get everything in early, including schoolwork, paperwork, and financial aid. Get help when you need it. Don't follow your friends because they are not YOU. Community service is well needed

Grambling State University helps all of the students greatly. Grambling State University prepares students for the life after college. Grambling State University is the school Where everybody is somebody.
pageTitle: Grambling State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I am enjoying being here because Grambling allows you to get your education and also time to have fun because it has everything from parties, to flag football to 3 on 3 tournaments and that keeps my time at Grambling good. Some other things about Grambling that I'm enjoying is that they also have plenty of extracurriuclar activities for you to participate in like Fraternities,Clubs, and Intramural league sports. Am learning a lot Grambling is a great school because you get to experienve the life of a black college and how diffeerent some things at grambling are compared to other schools. Grambling also gives you the chance to make out there in the work world with the education and things you learn from Grambling Login to rate or flag the reviews Jasmine from Colfax, LA 01/11/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 8 out of 8 people found this review useful. 3 of 47 Categories Comments Campus Safety
